body_html:
Thank you so much! @jart

Update: I have figured out the answer to the second question -
How can I pass configuration flags to LLVM in TensorFlow to check for Polly usage?

Its by adding TF_XLA_FLAGS="--xla_cpu_llvm_cl_opts=-polly" to the python command.

However, the -polly flag is not being recognized by llvm yet, and that means that the pass manager has not yet been linked correctly. I will need some help regarding the same.

Thanks.

body:
Thank you so much! @jart 

Update: I have figured out the answer to the second question -
How can I pass configuration flags to LLVM in TensorFlow to check for Polly usage?

Its by adding ``` TF_XLA_FLAGS="--xla_cpu_llvm_cl_opts=-polly" ``` to the python command.  

However, the ```-polly``` flag is not being recognized by llvm yet, and that means that the pass manager has not yet been linked correctly. I will need some help regarding the same.

Thanks.
